questions.question: 1.Antibodies can be labelled with FITC through which of the following residue :

answers.a: Hydrophobic and bind non-covalently to proteins
answers.b: Hydrophobic and bind covalently to proteins
answers.c: Hydrophilic and bind non-covalently to proteins
